snippet: Six of the seven justices of the constitutional court approved President Pierre Nkurunziza’s bid. The holdout refused to sign, called it illegal and fled to Rwanda.
abstract: Burundi's constitutional court approves Pres Pierre Nkurunziza's bid for third term; justice who refused to sign ruling flees to Rwanda.

byline.contributor: Sadi Niyungeko contributed reporting from Bujumbura, Burundi.

lead_paragraph: Six of the seven justices of the constitutional court approved President Pierre Nkurunziza’s bid. The holdout refused to sign, called it illegal and fled to Rwanda.

headline.main: Burundi Court Backs President’s Bid for Third Term
headline.print_headline: Divided Court in Burundi Backs Leader Amid Unrest
